Package org.apache.spark.streaming

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JavaTestBase
    Exposes streaming test functionality in a Java-friendly way.
    TestSuiteBase
    This is the base trait for Spark Streaming testsuites.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicOperationsSuite  
    BatchInfoCollector
    Listener that collects information on processed batches
    CheckpointSuite
    This test suites tests the checkpointing functionality of DStreams - the checkpointing of a DStream's RDDs as well as the checkpointing of the whole DStream graph.
    Duration  
    FailureSuite
    This testsuite tests master failures at random times while the stream is running using the real clock.
    InputStreamsSuite  
    JavaCheckpointTestUtils  
    JavaTestUtils  
    Milliseconds
    Helper object that creates instance of Duration representing a given number of milliseconds.
    Minutes
    Helper object that creates instance of Duration representing a given number of minutes.
    MultiThreadTestReceiver
    This is a receiver to test multiple threads inserting data using block generator
    NetworkReceiverSuite
    Testsuite for testing the network receiver behavior
    ReceiverInfoCollector
    Listener that collects information on processed batches
    Seconds
    Helper object that creates instance of Duration representing a given number of seconds.
    StreamingContext
    Main entry point for Spark Streaming functionality.
    StreamingContextSuite  
    StreamingListenerSuite  
    StreamingListenerSuiteReceiver  
    TestActor
    This is an actor for testing actor input stream
    TestInputStream<T>
    This is a input stream just for the testsuites.
    TestOutputStream<T>
    This is a output stream just for the testsuites.
    TestOutputStreamWithPartitions<T>
    This is a output stream just for the testsuites.
    TestReceiver
    Custom receiver for testing whether all data received by a receiver gets processed or not
    TestServer
    This is a server to test the network input stream
    Time
    This is a simple class that represents an absolute instant of time.
    UISuite  
    WindowOperationsSuite  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TestException
